great-ball.name: Great Ball
great-ball.description: A good BALL with a higher catch rate than a POKé BALL.

potion.name: Potion
potion.description: Restores the HP of a POKéMON by 20 points.

max-potion.name: Max Potion
max-potion.description: Fully restores the HP of a POKéMON.

poke-ball.name: Poké Ball
poke-ball.description: A tool used for catching wild POKéMON.

hyper-potion.name: Hyper Potion
hyper-potion.description: Restores the HP of a POKéMON by 200 points.

fresh-water.name: Fresh Water
fresh-water.description: A mineral water that restores HP by 50 points.

master-ball.name: Master Ball
master-ball.description: The best BALL that catches a POKéMON without fail.

full-restore.name: Full Restore
full-restore.description: Fully restores the HP and status of a POKéMON.

ultra-ball.name: Ultra Ball
ultra-ball.description: A better BALL with a higher catch rate than a GREAT BALL.

super-potion.name: Super Potion
super-potion.description: Restores the HP of a POKéMON by 50 points.

lava-cookie.name: Lava Cookie
lava-cookie.description: A local specialty that heals all status problems.

full-heal.name: Full Heal
full-heal.description: Heals all the status problems of one POKéMON.

soda-pop.name: Soda Pop
soda-pop.description: A fizzy soda drink that restores HP by 60 points.

lemonade.name: Lemonade
lemonade.description: A very sweet drink that restores HP by 80 points.

moomoo-milk.name: Moomoo Milk
moomoo-milk.description: A nutritious milk that restores HP by 100 points.

elixir.name: Elixir
elixir.description: Restores the PP of all moves by 10.

revive.name: Revive
revive.description: Revives a fainted POKéMON with half its HP.

ether.name: Ether
ether.description: Restores the PP of a selected move by 10.

x-sp-atk.name: X Sp. Atk
x-sp-atk.description: Raises the stat SP. ATK during one battle.

max-ether.name: Max Ether
max-ether.description: Fully restores the PP of a selected move.

max-elixir.name: Max Elixir
max-elixir.description: Fully restores the PP of a POKéMON’s moves.

x-defense.name: X Defense
x-defense.description: Raises the stat DEFENSE during one battle.

x-speed.name: X Speed
x-speed.description: Raises the stat SPEED during one battle.

x-attack.name: X Attack
x-attack.description: Raises the stat ATTACK during one battle.

max-revive.name: Max Revive
max-revive.description: Revives a fainted POKéMON with all its HP.

calcium.name: Calcium
calcium.description: Raises the base SP. ATK stat of one POKéMON.

x-sp-def.name: X Sp. Def
x-sp-def.description: An item that raises the Sp. Def stat of a Pokémon in battle. It wears off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.

iron.name: Iron
iron.description: Raises the base DEFENSE stat of one POKéMON.

protein.name: Protein
protein.description: Raises the base ATTACK stat of one POKéMON.

guard-spec.name: Guard Spec.
guard-spec.description: Prevents stat reduction when used in battle.

dire-hit.name: Dire Hit
dire-hit.description: Raises the critical-hit ratio during one battle.

carbos.name: Carbos
carbos.description: Raises the base SPEED stat of one POKéMON.

x-accuracy.name: X Accuracy
x-accuracy.description: Raises accuracy of attack moves during one battle.

hp-up.name: HP Up
hp-up.description: Raises the base HP of one POKéMON.

zinc.name: Zinc
zinc.description: Raises the base SP. DEF stat of one POKéMON.

thunder-stone.name: Thunder Stone
thunder-stone.description: Makes certain species of POKéMON evolve.

oran-berry.name: Oran Berry
oran-berry.description: A hold item that restores 10 HP in battle.

dawn-stone.name: Dawn Stone
dawn-stone.description: A peculiar stone that makes certain species of Pokémon evolve. It sparkles like eyes.

moon-stone.name: Moon Stone
moon-stone.description: Makes certain species of POKéMON evolve.

fire-stone.name: Fire Stone
fire-stone.description: Makes certain species of POKéMON evolve.

sun-stone.name: Sun Stone
sun-stone.description: Makes certain species of POKéMON evolve.

leaf-stone.name: Leaf Stone
leaf-stone.description: Makes certain species of POKéMON evolve.

shiny-stone.name: Shiny Stone
shiny-stone.description: A peculiar stone that makes certain species of Pokémon evolve. It shines with a dazzling light.

dusk-stone.name: Dusk Stone
dusk-stone.description: A peculiar stone that makes certain species of Pokémon evolve. It is as dark as dark can be.

water-stone.name: Water Stone
water-stone.description: Makes certain species of POKéMON evolve.

sitrus-berry.name: Sitrus Berry
sitrus-berry.description: A hold item that restores 30 HP in battle.

rawst-berry.name: Rawst Berry
rawst-berry.description: A hold item that heals a burn in battle.

lum-berry.name: Lum Berry
lum-berry.description: A hold item that heals any status problem in battle.

tm01.name: TM01
tm01.description: Powerful, but makes the user flinch if hit by the foe.

cheri-berry.name: Cheri Berry
cheri-berry.description: A hold item that heals paralysis in battle.

chesto-berry.name: Chesto Berry
chesto-berry.description: A hold item that awakens POKéMON in battle.

tm02.name: TM02
tm02.description: Hooks and slashes the foe with long, sharp claws.

leppa-berry.name: Leppa Berry
leppa-berry.description: A hold item that restores 10 PP in battle.

aspear-berry.name: Aspear Berry
aspear-berry.description: A hold item that defrosts POKéMON in battle.

pecha-berry.name: Pecha Berry
pecha-berry.description: A hold item that heals poisoning in battle.

tm03.name: TM03
tm03.description: Generates an ultrasonic wave that may confuse.

tm09.name: TM09
tm09.description: Shoots 2 to 5 seeds in a row to strike the foe.

tm05.name: TM05
tm05.description: A savage roar that makes the foe flee  to end the battle.

tm06.name: TM06
tm06.description: Poisons the foe with a toxin that gradually worsens.

tm11.name: TM11
tm11.description: Raises the power of FIRE-type moves for 5 turns.

tm04.name: TM04
tm04.description: Raises SP. ATK and SP. DEF by focusing the mind.

tm10.name: TM10
tm10.description: The attack power varies among different POKéMON.

tm08.name: TM08
tm08.description: Bulks up the body to boost both ATTACK & DEFENSE.

tm12.name: TM12
tm12.description: Enrages the foe so it can only use attack moves.

tm07.name: TM07
tm07.description: Creates a hailstorm that damages all types except ICE.

tm14.name: TM14
tm14.description: A brutal snow-and- wind attack that may freeze the foe.

tm18.name: TM18
tm18.description: Raises the power of WATER-type moves for 5 turns.

tm16.name: TM16
tm16.description: Creates a wall of light that lowers SP. ATK damage.

tm19.name: TM19
tm19.description: Recovers half the HP of the damage  this move inflicts.

tm21.name: TM21
tm21.description: The less the user likes you, the more powerful this move.

tm13.name: TM13
tm13.description: Fires an icy cold beam that may freeze the foe.

tm22.name: TM22
tm22.description: Absorbs sunlight in the 1st turn, then attacks next turn.

tm17.name: TM17
tm17.description: Negates all damage, but may fail if used in succession.

tm20.name: TM20
tm20.description: Prevents status abnormality with a mystical power.

tm15.name: TM15
tm15.description: Powerful, but needs recharging the next turn.

tm32.name: TM32
tm32.description: Creates illusory copies to enhance elusiveness.

tm25.name: TM25
tm25.description: Strikes the foe with a thunderbolt. It may paralyze.

tm27.name: TM27
tm27.description: The more the user likes you, the more powerful this move.

tm26.name: TM26
tm26.description: Causes a quake that has no effect on flying foes.

tm23.name: TM23
tm23.description: Slams the foe with a hard tail. It may lower DEFENSE.

tm24.name: TM24
tm24.description: A powerful electric attack that may cause paralysis.

tm31.name: TM31
tm31.description: Destroys barriers like LIGHT SCREEN and causes damage.

tm29.name: TM29
tm29.description: A powerful psychic attack that may lower SP. DEF.

tm30.name: TM30
tm30.description: Hurls a dark lump at the foe. It may lower SP. DEF.

tm28.name: TM28
tm28.description: Digs underground the 1st turn, then strikes next turn.

tm38.name: TM38
tm38.description: A powerful fire attack that may burn the foe.

tm40.name: TM40
tm40.description: An extremely fast attack that can’t be avoided.

tm33.name: TM33
tm33.description: Creates a wall of light that weakens physical attacks.

tm41.name: TM41
tm41.description: Prevents the foe from using the same move in a row.

tm35.name: TM35
tm35.description: Looses a stream of fire that may burn the foe.

tm39.name: TM39
tm39.description: Stops the foe from moving with rocks. May lower SPEED.

tm42.name: TM42
tm42.description: Raises ATTACK when poisoned, burned, or paralyzed.

tm37.name: TM37
tm37.description: Causes a sandstorm that hits the foe over several turns.

tm36.name: TM36
tm36.description: Hurls sludge at the foe. It may poison the foe.

tm34.name: TM34
tm34.description: Zaps the foe with a jolt of electricity that never misses.

tm47.name: TM47
tm47.description: Spreads hard- edged wings and slams into the foe.

hm01.name: HM01
hm01.description: Attacks the foe with sharp blades or claws.

tm49.name: TM49
tm49.description: Steals the effects of the move the foe is trying to use.

tm45.name: TM45
tm45.description: Makes it tough to attack a foe of the opposite gender.

tm44.name: TM44
tm44.description: The user sleeps for 2 turns to restore health and status.

tm43.name: TM43
tm43.description: Adds an effect to attack depending on the location.

tm50.name: TM50
tm50.description: Enables full-power attack, but sharply lowers SP. ATK.

tm48.name: TM48
tm48.description: Switches abilities with the foe on the turn this is used.

tm46.name: TM46
tm46.description: While attacking, it may steal the foe’s held item.

hm02.name: HM02
hm02.description: Flies up on the first turn, then attacks next turn.

hm04.name: HM04
hm04.description: Builds enormous power, then slams the foe.

hm03.name: HM03
hm03.description: Creates a huge wave, then crashes it down on the foe.

hm05.name: HM05
hm05.description: Looses a powerful blast of light that reduces accuracy.
